title: Capture New Value from Your Existing Tech Infrastructure - HBR.org Daily
content: Capture New Value from Your Existing Tech Infrastructure  HBR.org Daily
description: Axiata Group, a Malaysia-based telecommunications conglomerate, created a promising new business by using APIs to allow small businesses in Sri Lanka and Bangladesh to use its technology assets to create over 90,000 services. Its experiences can help other incumbents figure out how to tap the potential of their technology assets.
